content: lilac leaf socks instagram @northwoodsknits ravelry kfnk materials yarn fingering weight mc 250 - 450 yds cc 100 - 200 yds size 1 double pointed or circular needles gauge 32 st or 48 row = 4in tapestry needle sizes s m l sizes are based on the width of the sock the length of the sock is adjusted to the length of your foot my recommendations for sizes are below but if you have narrow feet consider knitting a smaller size and if you have wide feet consider a larger size small women s size 5 and below children medium women s size 6 to 10 mens size 8 and below large women s size 11+ men s size 9+ if you have a preferred sock pattern you already know fits your foot you can put the color charts onto that pattern as long as the number of stitches in the ankle and foot is a multiple of twelve there will be is difference between the right and left socks cuff - contrast color co 60 72 84 stitches in cc knit in chosen rib pattern sample in the photo uses 1 by 1 twisted rib for 1 in 12 row or as long as desired ankle - start in contrast color end in main color knit 4 row in stockinette with cc work color chart a 37 row work in stockinette with mc until the sock is 1 8 2 2 2 inches from desired length above the heel the sample has 22 row of mc before the heel but you can choose to make the socks longer or shorter heel flap - worked flat in main color row 1 knit 15 18 21 stitches turn row 2 sl 1 p 29 35 41 turn row 3 sl 1 * k1 sl1 * to end row 4 sl 1 p 29 35 41 repeat row 3 & 4 until the heel flap measures 1 8 2 2 2 inches about 22 25 28 row ending on row 4 turn heel -
